title: [RESOLVED] 1/16 Matchmaking Issues With Premades
body:
> [Update 1/16 6:16PM PST] 
We've found the issue to be related to one of the pre-made players only placing for season 2017 and not any other season. No exact ETA on fix yet, but hopefully that helps isolate your issue. 

>If you're looking to queue up and have additional questions, please see the FAQ: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ

> **NOTABLY**, placements this season will take into account what you placed last season and does not default you to silver unless you were also unranked last season. **TL;DR** - Diamond is still diamond from last year and can't queue up with Silver.

Hi Guys -

We're noticing some players aren't able to get into game when they hit the Find Match button. Reports are saying that some pre-mades aren't allowed to match.

We're working on getting it resolved. If there are other match making issues where you can't get into game, let us know what they are and what exactly is happening. Thanks!

replies.body: Why is this thread marked as resolved?

Goodluck on the fix!  Just waiting to play with my duo quo for some Storm of the century! 
 {{champion:101}} {{champion:40}}
im still having issues too and cant invite my premade who i played all games with last season
Im still having issues and cant duo q with anyone
My friend and I both ended Plat 5 and are still unable to duo in solo queue but we ended plat 5 and silver 2 in flex but can still queue up? Riot pls???
Any updates?
The fix was pushed out yesterday, but there are some cache flushes that are still happening with some accounts. All should be resolved this afternoon if it isn't fixed already for affected accounts.
Over a week and still not fixed tehe
Still not fixed for me , riot youre really taking away the only reason i came back to this game after 3 months.
and server transfers? what is going on???
I got plat when season ended and climbed up to diamond in preseason. My friend is also diamond but we can't duo together.
When is this going to be fixed?
We have leads on a fix, but we are still testing it. A fix is estimate to be pushed out sometime tomorrow.

I take it the fix was pushed back another day? EU here, so I'm morning for us and I suppose your work day is over, and hence no fix for today.
I mean, its Rito. If it is fixed by the weekend I would be surprised. I get breaks, but why is this shit happening when there is all of preseason to test this shit.
So what's riots plan here? Just ignore us and never fix this and hope we play our placements solo to get our rank back and fix it on our own?
"resolved" definitely NOT and when you ask the support for help they answer you with "we cant help" exdee
4 days into season still no fix...hopefully they can send a patch out tmrw so I can play this weekend.

Still having trouble queing up.... Any update when I can que with my buddy? Getting a little antsy having to wait a little longer for something I've had to already wait a while for! Good luck fixing.....

The issue should be fully resolved now. If you're still experiencing it, try our [support site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). The tech guys there can look at your account and your duo queue's account and either troubleshoot or explain why it's not letting you guys play together.

Your MMR is a soft reset(Meaning that it moves down to allow the higher elo players that can't be placed above plat 1 to go down the ladder).

You cant, your rank from last season will determine if you can play your placements together
My Premate got a 14-Day Ban in Season 7 and we also cant duo together... I ended the Season in Platinum 4 and he in Gold 2. Are you unable to play duoq when u got banned in the season before?

> [{quoted}](name=2 Carrys 1 Cup,realm=EUW,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=bVP9K9hm,comment-id=0019,timestamp=2018-01-17T06:39:51.439+0000)
>
> My Premate got a 14-Day Ban in Season 7 and we also cant duo together... I ended the Season in Platinum 4 and he in Gold 2. Are you unable to play duoq when u got banned in the season before?

Your premate has to solo q his placements as his account is treated as silver until after placements. Sorry for the late info, at least im faster than rito.

After repeatedly nagging riot i finally got an answer. If you had an account violation that nullified your end of season rewards (border etc) then your account is treated as silver until after your placements. Basically, if your in the same boat as me you just gotta solo your placements to get your rank back before you can queue with your friends (assuming your friends are higher than gold).
